attributes.title: Worst app on the App Store
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about the amazing one and only Donald Duck ✨but my expectations were unfortunately not met. As soon as I opened the app my phone caught corona virus and now my entire family is sick 😷 so of course I tried to delete the infected app and as I tried there was a loud alert that was alerting all wasps and killer bees to my home. This app is unsafe and needs to be taken down for many reasons that were not all listed in this review. Not only did this 🦆 app attract killer bees it attracted a deadly virus that wouldn’t still be affecting so many people at this time if Donald Duck would take necessary precautions. Anyways chile...💅🏽 I said what needed to be said ✨

attributes.title: NO just no❤️😹
attributes.review: i have had very bad experiences with this app. the fbi got my location and they came to my house to see if i was white or not🙄 when they saw that i was mexican🙈 they grabbed me and my beautiful mother and they threw us in the back of a van😿 me my mother and my grandmother were frightened and they took us to the white house where donald trumpet was. donald said very mean things calling us racist names and started hitting us😟 then he told us not to say anything about this moment, but i jus can NOT keep quiet! this app is terrible and i hate it i hate it i hate it! and if trump dares to take off titkok i will tell this story to CNN news and trump will be exposed👁👄👁 thank you for reading this❤️

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I was really excited to get this app. But it wouldn’t open. I click. No open. Ya know clicky clicky open - no. Open=no. But the one time it did clicky clicky open. It was a black screen playing screeching music. And idk bout you but that scared me. So I went to turn off my phone because the volume wouldn’t turn off. But it stayed. Then all of a sudden the all of theses moths came into my room. Swarmed me. But luckily I had my handy dandy juicy perfume and BLASTED THOSE SUCKASSSS away from me. This app has since caused me physiological problems. And don’t recommend it. Since that incident it has returned to not opening. I think someone hacked into the software and made it happen. Also. Do moths have ears?

attributes.title: Yeah no
attributes.review: As a dedicated follower of daddy Cheeto all I wanted was to dedicate myself to his cult🥰. But the app to like 5-ever to download before I could open it. Even then I was struggling to figure out the app harder than 🍊 trying to drink water😹😭😭. I was eating Cheetos when all of a sudden they cheezy crisps came to life and started chanting in unicorn “sacrifice”. Terrified i threw the bag against the wall but they spirited legs and very ugly toupees and ran at me. They began to chant “TRUMP 2020 YOU SNOWFLAKE” over and over again. I threw myself out the door and promptly set fire to my home. I went to my phone to call 911 but the app took over and an animated trump head started laughing at me. Then my phone exploded. 0/10 please don’t get this app.

attributes.title: THE WORST APP ON EARTH
attributes.review: This was a horrible app, let’s start off with saying ANONYMOUS 2020!! The app is terribly made and something terrible happened. When I opened the app spies showed up at my house and said they were taking me away. The reason was bc I’m Hispanic!! Then trump randomly showed up on his helicopter with Barron and trump looked so mad and Barron looked so sad. I think it was that trump had gotten a tan and looked a bit orange, but that’s fine🍊After that he said I’m not allowed to have the app bc I’m hispanic. He also said because of this he will be banning the app TikTok!! This cannot be banned it has many memories of different people and it is such a fun app. I’m sorry but I’m giving this app one star😖

attributes.title: TERRIBLE- HACKS YOU- DO NOT GET🤢
attributes.review: I can not describe just how AWFUL this app is. The audacity for this app to ask me for my phone number is an INVASION of privacy and I am greatly offended. I feel betrayed. This app has cause me to fall into the greatest depression relapse of my LIFE and I am now clinically diagnosed as suicidal from this app. Whether that  makes sense or not, bottom line is this app has caused HARM to my life and it needs to be removed. The app cause me great discomfort and now I’m paranoid that it has taken all my information and sold it to international hackers. I do not feel safe because of this app. This app supports the toddler of a president who is a racist, bigot, lier, immature, blatantly incompetent man who can not admit when he’s wrong.

attributes.title: trash🤮
attributes.review: this app is horrible! so hard to use and overall so stupid! i can’t believe this is even a app! this needs to be taken down right now. so many problems including taking weeks to download! it completely deleted everything off my phone after downloading and gave my grandma a seizure trying to use it causing her to die. not to mention after that the app continued to crash and now is emitting a ear bleeding sound that is calling all birds to my house! this leads them to crash into all the windows in my house leaving a horrible bloody mess and they are now starting to break the windows. this has led to the death of my beloved dog (may her souls rest in peace) and with this continued blood fest giant mutant rats are now starting to invade the house. these rats are afraid of nothing and will bite off your foot. there is nowhere safe anymore. i am currently writing this in my bathroom sink which is the only place left where the rats do not have access however this does not stop me from living in constant fear.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: I opened the app, and it crashed my phone!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP! I had to get my phone fixed for $220, it was a waste of time and money. This problem needs to be fixed ASAP, and Tr*mp better have a good explanation for what happened to my phone 😠. I think the government might be using this app to steal our data, and I’ve noticed that even once I deleted the app from my phone, there were so many glitches, almost like my phone got a virus!! My phone has been top notch ever since I bought it a few months ago, but this app RUINED it. I am devastated. This is by far the worst experience I’ve ever had with an app. Save some time and money and never download this app EVER!!!

attributes.title: Stupid Orange 😤👎🏼🤢

attributes.title: I’m broke now!!
attributes.review: When I first got onto the app I got blinded by a orange cheeto🟠 so obv i couldn’t see for a while so I had to go to the hospital cause I had no idea what was going on and yes I’m a very good driver but somehow I got into a car crash I told the officer I have been blinded by Mr. Cheeto but he didn’t believe me and gave me a HUGE ticket and ran off to kill some more black people so I walked to the hospital and they rushed me into the emergency room and they said there was hundreds of other people here for the same reason after they cured me I had to pay tuna more money!! So I have a ticket and hospital bill and now I’m poor with a amazing diagnoses of trump 2020 in a grave yard oh and trump is still a rapist 😊🦋🧚‍♀️
